com.amplifyframework.auth

Class AuthPlugin<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.auth.AuthPlugin<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The class type of the escape hatch provided by the plugin
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthCategoryBehavior, CategoryTypeable, Plugin<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AWSCognitoAuthPlugin

    public abstract class AuthPlugin<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthCategoryBehavior, Plugin<E>
    Abstract class that a plugin implementation of the Auth Category would extend. This includes the client behavior dictated by AuthCategoryBehavior and Plugin.
